column5: Just found this on my computer whilst housecleaning. Hope it didn't originate here. Maybe it'll be as funny this time around -  I became confused when I heard the word 'Service' used with these agencies:  Canada Revenue 'Service' Postal 'Service' Telephone 'Service' Cable TV 'Service' Civil 'Service' Government 'Service' Customer 'Service'  This is not what I thought 'Service' meant.  But today, I overheard two farmers talking, and one of them said he had hired a bull to 'Service' a few cows.  BAM!!! It all came into focus. Now I understand what all those agencies are doing to us.  Now you are as enlightened as I am.  JF
I hear ya John....we all get serviced regularly.
Hmmm, just like the price of gas at the "service" station
I take great pride in "servicing" various levels of govt. when required.
The bus stops at the bus station.  The train stops at the train station.  I have a work station....  Michael
